name.description: Specifies the name of the Recovery Services Vault. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Recovery Services Vault. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

sku.description: Sets the vault's SKU. Possible values include: `Standard`, `RS0`.

soft_delete_enabled.description: Is soft delete enable for this Vault? Defaults to `true`.

id.description: The ID of the Recovery Services Vault.

create.description: Used when creating the Recovery Services Vault.

update.description: Used when updating the Recovery Services Vault.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Recovery Services Vault.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Recovery Services Vault.
